title: Energy Steroids as Failed Sulong Pills Theory
theoryText: Some fans theorize that Energy Steroids might be failed attempts at creating Sulong pills for minks, explaining the similar transformation effects (white hair, increased power) and the connection between Fish-Man Island and the Minks through the Kozuki clan.
author: One Piece Theory Community

spoilerStatus.spoilerDescription: References Sulong transformation and Zou Arc content

title: Noah and Joy Boy's Broken Promise
theoryText: The damage to Noah in this episode represents a setback to Joy Boy's promise, but fans theorize that Luffy himself may be the one to fulfill the original promise to bring Noah to the surface using Shirahoshi's (Poseidon's) power, possibly during the final war.
author: One Piece Theory Community

spoilerStatus.spoilerDescription: Discusses future storyline implications and Joy Boy's identity

title: Hody Jones as a Thematic Villain
theoryText: Fans theorize that Hody Jones being intentionally weak was Oda's way of showing that hatred without substance is ultimately powerless. Unlike previous villains who had genuine strength or conviction, Hody represents pure inherited hatred with no real foundation, making him a 'hollow' antagonist by design to demonstrate the Straw Hats' growth and the emptiness of baseless prejudice.
author: One Piece Analysis Community

spoilerStatus.spoilerDescription: Only discusses Fish-Man Island Arc content

title: Chopper's Monster Point and Awakening Potential
theoryText: The revelation of Chopper's controlled Monster Point in this episode led to fan theories that this represents a step toward Devil Fruit Awakening. Some theorize that Chopper's ability to control what was previously an unstable transformation might indicate he's closer to awakening his Hito Hito no Mi than other Straw Hats, potentially leading to even more powerful transformations in the future.
author: One Piece Power Scaling Community

spoilerStatus.spoilerDescription: Discusses Devil Fruit Awakening concepts revealed in later arcs
